channel.title: CVE Feed for lagunaisw -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for lagunaisw -- all products

item.title: CVE-2024-9522|2024-10-10T17:47:02.026Z -- lagunaisw -- wp%20users%20masquerade
item.description: The WP Users Masquerade plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to authentication bypass in versions up to, and including, 2.0.0. This is due to incorrect authentication and capability checking in the 'ajax_masq_login' function. This makes it possible for authenticated attackers, with subscriber-level permissions and above, to log in as any existing user on the site, such as an administrator.

item.title: CVE-2024-9522|2024-10-10T02:06:06.456Z -- lagunaisw -- wp%20users%20masquerade
item.description: The WP Users Masquerade plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to authentication bypass in versions up to, and including, 2.0.0. This is due to incorrect authentication and capability checking in the 'ajax_masq_login' function. This makes it possible for authenticated attackers, with subscriber-level permissions and above, to log in as any existing user on the site, such as an administrator.
